Navigation-Bar.footer: Become a leading Logistics Company committed to providing reliable and efficient shipping solutions.

Header-Home.title: Reach To All Corners of The World With Us
Header-Home.subtitle: Always ready to meet your logistics needs safely, quickly and with certainty according to your destination.

About-Short.desc: is a leading logistics company committed to providing reliable and efficient shipping solutions. With strong experience and dedication, we are ready to help meet your logistics needs, from long distance deliveries to small quantity deliveries. Our professional team works hard to ensure every delivery is made safely and on time, providing maximum customer satisfaction.
About-Short.desc-1: We understand the importance of trust in this industry, and we strive to be a reliable partner every step of your product journey. Join us for an amazing delivery experience!
About-Short.vision-desc: To be the best leading, trusted and reliable logistics company by prioritizing customer trust and satisfaction
About-Short.mission-1: Provide competitive, quality and safe services.
About-Short.mission-2: To be a solution for customers in their goods delivery needs.
About-Short.mission-3: Carry out management and technology developments so as to provide customer satisfaction and trust.

Services-Home.title: What can we offer?
Services-Home.subtitle: We are committed to providing the best delivery service supported by an extensive network, advanced technology, professional team and full commitment.
Services-Home.subline-1: We provide delivery services across Indonesia quickly and safely.
Services-Home.subline-2: Fast services for deliveries within the city or nearby cities.
Services-Home.subline-3: We handle large quantity shipments with a ready fleet.
Services-Home.subline-4: Small package delivery with efficient and affordable service.
Services-Home.subline-5: We deliver various types of goods safely and on time.

Sector-Home.subline: We cover different industry sectors, from food and beverage, chemical, retail, durable goods and more.

Recent-Home.title: Delivery Activity Gallery
Recent-Home.subtitle: Explore our key moments and achievements through a collection of images that illustrate our dedication and commitment.

Member-Home.title: Our talent and professional members
Member-Home.subtitle: Meet friendly, experienced, knowledgeable and dynamic team members who always make our customers pleased with.

CTA.title: Get in touch with us
CTA.subtitle: We are always here to answer your questions, provide more information, or assist you with your logistics needs. Feel free to reach out to us!

About.desc: We have built a team of employees, who are participated in professional training courses , are groomed to handle any emerging situation with a level of composure that gives the customer peace of mind.
About.desc2: PT Anugerah Multi Logistik (PT AML) is part of the holding company PT Tako Anugerah Koporasi (PT TAKO) (For more information, visit our website
About.desc3: , AML is known for its commitment in providing superior and integrated logistics solutions.
About.desc4: PT AML offers a wide range of logistics services, including Freight Forwarding, Custom Clearance, and Intermodal & Multimodal Transportation. Supported by a global network and modern technology, PT AML is ready to fulfill your logistics needs with high flexibility and efficiency. As part of PT TAKO, PT AML has a strong foundation to continue to grow and provide the best service to its customers.
About.content-1: Become the best leading, trusted and reliable Export and Import Logistics Company by prioritizing customer trust and satisfaction
About.content-2: We are determined to be the first choice in logistics services, providing the best solutions for export and import needs, and providing unmatched satisfaction to every customer. With a focus on reliability, professionalism and innovation, we are committed to continuously improving service quality for customer satisfaction and trust.
About.content-li-1: Providing Competitive, Quality and Safe Services
About.content-li-2: Become a customer solution for export and import shipping needs.
About.content-li-3: Carrying out management and technology developments so as to provide satisfaction and trust to customers

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: Got a technical issue? Want to send feedback about a feature? Need details about our Business plan? Let us know.

WhychooseUs.title: Why Make Us
WhychooseUs.1: Committed to providing the best service and loyalty to every customer.
WhychooseUs.2: In delivering quality service, we always ensure the accuracy of the time estimates we promise.
WhychooseUs.3: Providing training for human resources to enhance service quality and reliability in fulfilling responsibilities entrusted by customers.
WhychooseUs.4: Ensuring every customer receives communicative information with friendly service, fostering good relationships with all parties.
WhychooseUs.5: Working together as a team with speed, precision, and accuracy to deliver satisfying results for customers.
WhychooseUs.6: Always ready to be the customer's solution, providing communicative and accurate services, which are key to our collaboration with customers.
WhychooseUs.7: In maintaining the trust given by our customers, we ensure that every delivery will be safe and meet customer needs.
